name: ack-raw-fs-guard
description: Warns when raw fs.writeFile or fs.writeFileSync is used instead of FileIOService atomic writes.

hooks.command: bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); FILE=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".file_path // empty"); if [[ "$FILE" == */src/*.ts ]] && [[ "$FILE" != *test* ]] && [[ "$FILE" != *fileio.service* ]]; then CONTENT=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".content // .new_string // empty"); BAD=$(echo "$CONTENT" | grep -nE "\b(fs\.writeFile|fs\.writeFileSync|writeFile|writeFileSync)\b" | grep -v "writeJsonFile" | grep -v "FileIOService" | grep -v "//" | head -5); if [[ -n "$BAD" ]]; then echo "WARNING: Raw fs.writeFile detected. Use FileIOService.writeJsonFile() for atomic writes with backup:" >&2; echo "$BAD" >&2; fi; fi'
